member.name: temp_sql
member.attr:desc: the generated SQL statement(s)

member.name: commentedOut
member.attr:desc: if set to 1 the sql will be commented out but e.g. still be written to the script

member.name: modelOnly
member.attr:desc: object exists in model but is not to be written to the database

member.name: version
member.attr:desc: version of the catalog's database

member.name: customData
member.attr:desc: a generic dictionary to hold additional information used by e.g. plugins

member.name: defaultSchema
member.attr:desc: currently selected schema

member.name: childRoles
member.attr:desc: the list of roles that derive from this one. They will have all privileges from this role and it's parents.

member.name: parentRole
member.attr:desc: role that this role derives from or empty if there is no parent role. All privileges which has parent present for current Role

member.name: privileges
member.attr:desc: the list of privileges available for this role

member.name: privileges
member.attr:desc: the privileges for the object, e.g. CREATE

member.name: databaseObject
member.attr:desc: the database object this privilege is assigned to

member.name: databaseObjectType
member.attr:desc: specifies the type, e.g. TABLE, used when wildcards are needed, like test.*

member.name: databaseObjectName
member.attr:desc: used when wildcards are needed, like test.*

member.name: password
member.attr:desc: the password assigned to the user

member.name: roles
member.attr:desc: the list of assigned roles

member.name: logFileGroup
member.attr:caption: Log File Group
member.attr:desc: the log file group that is used for this tablespace

method.name: addNewTable
method.attr:desc: create and add a new table to the schema. For MySQL tables, pass db.mysql as the dbpackage argument

signal.name: refreshDisplay
signal.attr:desc: notifies when a caption of an object in the schema is changed

member.name: wrapperName
member.attr:desc: the type of database server to connect to

member.name: user
member.attr:desc: the user to connect with

member.name: password
member.attr:desc: the password to connect with

member.name: host
member.attr:desc: the host name the server runs on

member.name: schema
member.attr:desc: the name of the schema to use

member.name: socket
member.attr:desc: the socket the server runs on

member.name: port
member.attr:desc: the port the server runs on

member.name: ownerUser
member.attr:desc: the owner

gstruct.name: db.Table
gstruct.attr:desc: an object that stores information about a database schema table

member.name: isStub
member.attr:desc: whether this table is a stub intended for foreign keys and triggers that refer to tables external to this model

method.name: createInsertsEditor
method.attr:desc: creates a grid object representing the inserts data, suitable for browsing and editing its contents

signal.name: refreshDisplay
signal.attr:desc: notifies when a caption of something in the table is changed

signal.name: foreignKeyChanged
signal.attr:desc: notifies when a foreign key has been added/removed or its definition changes

member.name: precision
member.attr:desc: for numeric types this represents the total number of digits that are stored including digits right from the decimal point

member.name: scale
member.attr:desc: the number of digits right to the decimal point

member.name: length
member.attr:desc: The total length of the column. For string types this referes to the number of characters that can be stored.

member.name: datatypeExplicitParams
member.attr:desc: For ENUM, SET and similar datatypes the parametes can be defined explictly. Note that brackets need to be included. This will overwrite the precision, scale and length setting

member.name: flags
member.attr:desc: additional flags like UNSIGNED, ZEROFILL, BINARY

member.name: group
member.attr:desc: the datatype group this datatype belongs to

member.name: characterMaximumLength
member.attr:desc: maximum number of characters this datatype can store

member.name: characterOctetLength
member.attr:desc: maximum number of 8 bit characters this datatype can store

member.name: numericPrecision
member.attr:desc: maximum numbers of digits the datatype can store

member.name: numericScale
member.attr:desc: maximum numbers of digits right from the decimal point the datatype can store

member.name: dateTimePrecision
member.attr:desc: the datetime precision the datatype can store

member.name: needsQuotes
member.attr:desc: whether values require quotes around them

member.name: validity
member.attr:desc: information about validity of this type. Allowed: comparison operator followed by version number

member.name: synonyms
member.attr:desc: the list of names that can be used as synonym for the datatype

member.name: flags
member.attr:desc: additional flags like UNSIGNED, ZEROFILL, BINARY

member.name: sqlDefinition
member.struct-name: definition of the datatype, eg: VARCHAR(32)

member.name: flags
member.struct-name: flags for the type, eg: UNSIGNED ZEROFILL

member.name: indexType
member.attr:desc: one of INDEX, PRIMARY, UNIQUE, FULLTEXT and SPATIAL

member.name: name
member.attr:desc: the object's name

member.name: mandatory
member.attr:desc: mandatory in the owner table

member.name: referencedMandatory
member.attr:desc: mandatory in the referenced table

member.name: many
member.attr:desc: cardinality of owner table

member.name: index
member.attr:desc: Index that was created for this Foreign Key. This should only be set when a index is created for the FK, in other cases (like on reverse engieer) it should be left unset. For that reason this should not be used to find the matching index for the FK.

gstruct.name: db.View
gstruct.attr:desc: a object that stores information about a database schema view

member.name: name
member.attr:desc: the current name of the object

member.name: oldModelSqlDefinition
member.attr:desc: this is set at the time of the last sync/rev-eng/fwd-eng to be able to tell if the SQL has been altered when the next sync is performed

member.name: oldServerSqlDefinition
member.attr:desc: this is set at the time of the last sync/rev-eng/fwd-eng to be able to tell if the SQL has been altered when the next sync is performed

gstruct.name: db.Routine
gstruct.attr:desc: an object that stores information about a database schema routine

member.name: name
member.attr:desc: the current name of the object

member.name: sequenceNumber
member.attr:desc: defines position in editor
specifies if the n-th routine is expanded in the editor, 0 if collapsed
member.name: routineExpandedStates

member.attr:desc: specifies the n-th routine height in the editor, 0 for automatic height
member.name: routineExpandedHeights
event
member.attr:desc: what fires the trigger (INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE)

member.name: ordering
member.attr:desc: the order in which triggers of the same event and timing are executed (FOLLOWS or PRECEDES)

member.name: otherTrigger
member.attr:desc: the name of the trigger to which order is relative

member.name: timing
member.attr:desc: when the trigger fires (AFTER or BEFORE)

member.name: definer
member.attr:desc: a full user name ('user'@'host') or CURRENT_USER

member.name: useInterval
member.attr:desc: 1 if to use the interval* members, otherwise for at

member.name: at
member.attr:desc: the expression to define an execution timestamp, mutually exclusive with the interval* members

member.name: interval
member.attr:desc: the expression to define an interval, mutually exclusive with the at member

member.name: intervalUnit
member.attr:desc: one of the interval units, except microseconds, e.g. SECOND, HOUR etc.

member.name: intervalStart
member.attr:desc: optional expression for a start timestamp

member.name: intervalEnd
member.attr:desc: optional expression for an end timestamp

member.name: preserved
member.attr:desc: 0 if the event is automatically dropped after last occurrence

member.name: sqlBody
member.attr:desc: the sql code to execute on each invocation of the event

member.name: minValue
member.attr:desc: Minimum value of sequence

member.name: maxValue
member.attr:desc: Maximum value of sequence

member.name: startValue
member.attr:desc: The value that starts the sequence

member.name: incrementBy
member.attr:desc: Value by which sequence is increased

member.name: cycleFlag
member.attr:desc: Does sequence begin again with minimum value once maximum value has been reached?

member.name: orderFlag
member.attr:desc: Are the sequence values granted in the order of the request?

member.name: cacheSize
member.attr:desc: Number of sequence values that are loaded into cache simultaneously

member.name: lastNumber
member.attr:desc: Last sequence value that was saved
the database's catalog
member.name: dbCatalog

member.attr:desc: the tree of changes to apply
member.name: changeTree

gstruct.name: db.DatabaseSyncObject
gstruct.attr:caption: Synchronisation Object
gstruct.attr:desc: an object used for object changes

member.attr:desc: if set to 1 the object has been modified
member.name: changed

member.attr:desc: 0 to apply the change to the database, 1 to apply the change to the model
member.name: alterDirection

member.attr:desc: reference to the model object, empty if this is a new object in the database
member.name: modelObject

member.attr:desc: reference to the database object, empty if this is a new object in the model
member.name: dbObject

member.attr:desc: a listing of log messages generated during object synchronization
member.name: syncLog
